bio.about: Working on Microsoft Teams Platform team Since 2019

experiences.description: Working on Microsoft Teams Mobile Platform team and have worked on various layers in past 4 years. Currently, I am responsible for Auth related areas and developer experience on mobile platform side.

At Zoomcar, I was responsible for the end to end app development and enhancement. In the few years, I upgraded the code to Swift, re-designed and built payment and KYC sections and many more polishings.

At Goodbox, I worked on some of the new features in the Consumer and partner app. Where I developed a syncing component for react pages in the app. Apart from the development, I streamlined the beta release process (using Fastlane) and improved the git workflow in the team. A great team and a very good work experience. .

At this point, I was responsible for technical practices and health of the team. In the role of a tech lead, I was pushed to a new level of deep dives and some big responsibilities that involved mentor and polishing the development team. Was involved in much higher level project discussions. Meeting clients, understanding the business needs and conveying the same to the team and translate these into robust and scalable system. I was also leading multiple projects and was spearheading efforts of developing reusable frameworks and libraries to cut down development time.

I was a part of multiple projects teams and wearing different hats for different projects. Majorly, an iOS developer and project architect, I was coordinating projects and was involved in client meetings and estimation processes. I have also lead a formulating of documentation strategy for a client project and trying to standardize a flexible yet appropriate documentation model for future projects.
I taught a class of 60 students subjects such as Computer system Organisation, Database management system

education.school: St. Jude's Hr. Sec. School, Khargone
